title: Portfolio v2 - Building with TanStack Start & React 19
excerpt: Modern portfolio with TanStack Start, React 19, and cutting-edge web technologies.
content:
## A New Era of Portfolio Development

**Portfolio v2** built with the latest web technologies.

### Technical Stack

- TanStack Start 1.149
- React 19.2 & TypeScript 5.9
- Bun runtime
- Tailwind CSS v4 & shadcn/ui
- Appwrite backend

### Features

- 5 Theme variants
- Blog system with Markdown
- SSR & code splitting
- Authentication system

### Theme Options

1. Royal Purple (default)
2. Midnight
3. Sunset
4. Neon
5. Aurora
author: Saito

title: Novaplex License System - Secure Software Licensing

content:

title: Lavalink Server - High-Performance Audio Streaming
excerpt: Public Lavalink server for Discord music bots with low latency and SSL encryption.
content:
## Professional Audio Streaming Infrastructure

High-performance audio streaming for Discord music bots.

### Connection Info

- Host: lavalink.novaplex.xyz
- Port: 443
- Password: astra.novaplex.xyz
- Secure: true (SSL/TLS)

### Features

- Up to 320kbps streaming
- Low latency (<50ms EU)
- SSL/TLS encryption
- DDoS protection
- 99.9% uptime

### Supported Sources

- YouTube & Spotify
- SoundCloud & Bandcamp
- Twitch Streams
- Direct HTTP URLs

### Performance

- 500+ concurrent players
- 35ms average latency
- Free for bot developers
author: Saito

title: Astra Bot - Building an All-in-One Discord Bot for 30+ Servers
excerpt: The journey of creating Astra Bot, a powerful Discord bot with moderation, music, economy, leveling, and more.
content:
## The Vision Behind Astra Bot

Astra Bot started as a simple idea: create a Discord bot that does everything, and does it well. Today, it serves over **30+ Discord servers**.

### Key Features

- **Moderation System** - Auto-mod, warnings, bans/mutes, logs
- **Music System** - High-quality streaming via Lavalink
- **Economy & Leveling** - Currency, XP, rewards, leaderboards
- **Utility** - Tickets, giveaways, polls, statistics

### Technical Stack

- Discord.js v14
- Node.js & MongoDB
- Redis for caching
- Lavalink for audio
- React dashboard

### Links

- Website: https://astra-bot.app
- GitHub: https://github.com/XSaitoKungX/Astra-Bot
author: Saito

title: Novaplex - Modern Game Server Hosting Platform
excerpt: Premium game server hosting with instant setup, DDoS protection, and 24/7 support.
content:
## Revolutionizing Game Server Hosting

**Novaplex** is a premium game server hosting platform for Discord bots and Minecraft servers.

### Core Features

- **NVMe SSDs** & AMD Ryzen CPUs
- **DDoS Protection** & SSL certificates
- **Instant deployment** - servers online in seconds
- **Modern control panel** with file manager

### Supported Services

- Discord Bots (Node.js 16-23)
- Minecraft Servers (Paper, Spigot, Forge)

### Business Model

Pay-as-you-go pricing - no hidden costs, no minimum contract.

### Links

- Website: https://novaplex.xyz
- Status: https://status.novaplex.xyz
author: Saito
